rows.label: qst000904_msg0001
rows.name: Phew, that was a close one, mo...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0002
rows.name:
If you hadn't come, Doruru
would be in the Ignas'
stomachs right now, mo.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, just thinking about
it is terrifying, mo...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0004
rows.name: Thank you for rescuing me, mo.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0005
rows.name:
But they took my cargo of
500 Ruby Mangosteens, mo...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0006
rows.name:
No, no, I can't be greedy.
As long as I'm alive,
that's what matters, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0007
rows.name:
As long as I'm alive, I can
always start over, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0008
rows.name:
Besides, I hired rookie mercenaries
this time, so I can't complain if
something like this happens, mo.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0009
rows.name:
Troubles are also a necessary
element for growth, mo.

rows.label: qst000904_msg0010
rows.name:
It's the job of merchants like
Doruru to nurture fine couriers
and mercenary bands, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0011
rows.name:
Once they've gained a lot
of experience and become a
fine mercenary band...

rows.label: qst000904_msg0012
rows.name:
They'll take on Doruru's
requests for a cheap price, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0013
rows.name:
Yes, yes! Doruru's future
is bright and shiny, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0014
rows.name:
Now, let's hurry back to
Lizzy and the others, mo!

rows.label: qst000904_msg0015
rows.name:
I can't stand being attacked
by Ignas again, mo! Of course,
you're coming with me, mo!
